text: Mahaan is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Mohan Kumar, starring Suresh Gopi and Geetha in the lead roles. http://spicyonion.com/title/mahaan- malayalam-movie/ Produced by Roshna Balakrishnan sister of famous physician and upcoming actor Rojith K Balakrishnan. == Cast == * Suresh Gopi * Captain Raju * Chithra * Geetha * Shari ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Mahaan (1992 film)
